Suezo again
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battlecard Episode II Archive (PSOne): Recipes: Suezo again
By Suezo183 on Saturday, September 2, 2000 - 11:37 pm:

This is my 1st Successfull team it is very usefull for a defensive continuess attack on the other teams also its full of moves that cant be dodged, this is very good for taking out the people who think they can dodge till you have 0 stacked cards!


Skill Cards:

Suezo: 2Spits(very good card good for a quick 2 damage with little guts required), 2Teleports, 2TailSlaps, 1bit, 1Tongue, 3Licks(lowers guts when fighting against those guys that need 20 guts too attack once =), 3SideRoll,

Mocchi: 1RollAttack, 3Thrusts, 1Headbutt, 1Press, 1:1-2Thrust, 1Licking, 1PetalWind, 1MotchRay, 2Rounds, 3Roll

Hare: 1Headbutt, 3Sobats, 1SuperHead, 2WindMill, 1SpinFist, 1Charge, 3Footworks.

Any Monster Cards: 1Critical(good with petalwind!!), 2BlowAways, 2Concentrates,

Breeder Cards: 1Mango, 2WildRush(afterall it is a rush type deck =),

Ok this deck can undergo some changes I was changing it around while I was typing this! Feel free to change things too improve its performance and state your oppinions enjoy!!!
